document_data.mainbody:
Gnashing Teeth is an adventure module set in the Forgotten Realms using the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition ruleset. It is part of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures published for the D&D Adventurers League. It focuses on Icewind Dale, and is an adventure designed for 1- to 4-level characters.
Characters
Channon • Clod • Kaskur Spearsong • Ogolai Orcsplitter • Old Goat • Rikuur Hideminder
Feral-Tongue
Events
Everlasting Rime
Creatures
dire wolf • ice toad • goliath • ice mephit • ice toad • mountain goat • mud mephit • winter wolf • wolf • wood woad
Location
Region Icewind Dale
Wilderness Wyrmdoom Crag
Magic
Items Sending stones
Potions Potion of healing • Potion of water breathing
Spells cure wounds • divination • greater restoration • identify • lesser restoration • prayer of healing • raise dead • remove curse • revivify • speak with dead • true resurrection
* D&D Adventurers League Guildmaster Chris Lindsay
* D&D Adventurers League Wizards Team Brandy Camel, Lea Helotis, Chris Lindsay, Chris Tulach
* D&D Adventurers League Administrator(s) Ma’at Crook, Amy Lynn Dzura, Claire Hoffman, Greg Marks, Alan Patrick, Travis Woodall
* Art Director and Graphic Designer Rich Lescouflair
* Interior Art Mark Behm, Jedd Chevrier, David René Christensen, Robson Michel, Brian Valeza
* Dragonmaw Spring Art Matthew Roderick
* Playtesters Patrick Beach, Francesca Clark, Daniel Franco, Travis Fuller, Wayne Fuller, Chris McGovern, Joe Mooney, Daniel Oliveira, Andrew Oliver, Alain Pham, Jonathan Reitz, Jia Jian Tin, Marcello Velazquez
